verblex: 1. To last an extremely short period of time.
2. To last for a short time. English = (be) temporary.
partlex: 1. Used next to a verb or phrase to mean the action lasts only for an extremely short period of time. English = briefly, momentarily.
2. Used between phrases or clauses to mean the second action occurs an extremely short period of time after the first. English = and then suddenly, straight away, shortly after.
nomlex: 1. An extremely short period of time. English = instant, moment.
